To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters Suggested change * @param gatewayAddress the IP socket address of gateway that the client can initially connect * to. Must be in format host:port. The default value is 127.0.0.1:51015 * . * @param gatewayAddress the IP socket address of a gateway that the client can initially connect * to. Must be in format host:port. The default value is 0.0.0.0:26500 * . I know you copied from the previous setting, but it seems there was a mistake with the default value - from what I can see in ZeebeClientBuilderImpl, it will be 0.0.0.0:26500? No idea where we got the 51015 😅

Must be in format host:port. The default value is 127.0.0.1:51015 + * .
